title: Internet Love
lyrics: I, i love to play on the internet And i, i love to surf round the internet I power up i switch on I'm on line all day I'm interactive in every way ...In every way Internet love Now i've been bitten by the Internet bug I surf the highway for Com puter love I'm stuck on internet love I'm stuck on internet love I, i like to fly around in cyberspace Cos my virtual rocket can go any place I power up i switch on I'm on line all day I'm interactive in every way ...In every way Internet love Now i've been bitten by the Internet bug I surf the highway for Com puter love I'm stuck on internet love I'm stuck on internet love
